subject: RE: [junit] junit test class location - with or without source code.
msgSnippet: ... Also consider compiling the tests to a different bin/. This makes it easy to not deliver test object (compiled) code. thanks
messageBody:
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Ray Tayek [mailto:rtayek@...]
> Sent: Friday, December 10, 2004 12:57 PM
> To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: RE: [junit] junit test class location - with or
> without source code.
> ...
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: mark_lybarger [mailto:mark_lybarger@...]
> > Sent: Friday, December 10, 2004 6:23 AM
> > To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> > Subject: [junit] junit test class location - with or without
> > source code.
> >
> > i'm looking for arguments for and against keeping junit test
> > classes outside if the projects main source tree.
>
> Same package in parallel source tree. ...

Also consider compiling the tests to a different bin/. This makes it easy to
not deliver test object (compiled) code.

thanks
